alert.note: Alert for Fluvanna; Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 3:55PM EDT until July 25 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR WEST CENTRAL LOUISA AND NORTHERN FLUVANNA COUNTIES... At 354 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Monticello, or 8 miles east of Charlottesville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Troy around 415 PM EDT. Ferncliff around 430 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Nahor, Bybee, Byrd Mill, Zion Crossroads, Wilmington, Cunningham, Union Mills and Wildwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
